short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Google Meet Voice Captoins Translate, Microsoft Teams Voice Captions Translate.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
1. Google Meet and Microsoft Teams Web audio/video conference voice captions translation, free to use.
2. Support translation between common languages, such as English, Chinese, French, Japanese, etc.
3. Translation can be selected using Google Translate or Microsoft Translate, free to use without registration.
4. Support viewing conference voice captions information in a new window, and choose other better translation tools for use.
5. Supports Chrome, Edge, Arc browsers.
6. Shortcut keys: Use Alt+T or Shift+Alt+T to open the speech captions display and translation window.
7. Safety: All voice captions content will not be uploaded to the server, only displayed locally, and will not be saved. Please feel free to use it.

Fixed bugs.
